Who is Dannielynn Birkhead?

Dannielynn Birkhead is the daughter of the late Anna Nicole Smith and Larry Birkhead. She was born on September 7, 2006, in the Bahamas. Dannielynn is the only child of Anna Nicole Smith, who died in 2007 from an accidental drug overdose. Larry Birkhead has been Dannielynn's legal guardian since her birth.

Dannielynn has been in the spotlight since she was born. She has appeared on magazine covers and in television shows. She has also been the subject of several legal battles, including a custody battle between Larry Birkhead and Anna Nicole Smith's ex-husband, Howard K. Stern.

Despite the challenges she has faced, Dannielynn is a happy and healthy child. She is close to her father and enjoys spending time with her family and friends.
